panels.visual: Party gathered in courtyard Sorrel in dragon form before them
panels.dialogue: Sorrel: "You have proven worthy of the trust placed in you."

panels.visual: Sorrel pulling a scale from his chest Glowing with inner light **Sound EFFECTS:** "*shimmer*"

panels.dialogue: Sorrel: "A token of our bond. Should you need draconic counsel again..."
Sorrel: "I believe you've restored the song these halls once knew. May it guide you in whatever futures you shape."
